about_the_game:
A Gift of Music from Märchen Forest

Enjoy magical melodies from the mysterious world of Märchen Forest with this 47 (+2)-song original soundtrack!

This compilation includes the game's theme song, Konomedoki, sung by Mylne (VA: Ayana Taketatsu), as well as the ending theme, Meguru Wa, sung by Rosetta (VA: Kanon Takao).

From beginning to end, this soundtrack is designed to enhance the Märchen Forest experience. Savor the transition from lighthearted fairy tale to dark dungeon-crawler as the story unfolds!
The theme song, Konomedoki, features an intricate melody and chorus sung by the main character, Mylne, that offers a deeper insight into the fantastic world of Märchen Forest.

Be sure to listen closely to the "Narration" and "#2" tracks, as well as Rosetta (VA: Kanon Takao)'s chorus during the final boss battle, available only on this soundtrack.

Atsuki Yoshida's unforgettable violin performance, in addition to the exciting battle music, are sure to get your blood pumping.

We hope you hear a bit of magic in Märchen Forest's original soundtrack!
